articles.title: Important Anniversaries in DPRK Observed in Foreign Countries
Korean People's Just Cause Supported
Functions for Reunification Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported 
    Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- To express solidarity with the Korean people is tantamount to solidarizing with progressive humankind in their struggle against subjugation and for freedom and liberation and to observe the month of international solidarity with the Korean people is an expression of the worldwide support to them, said the Arab Committee for Solidarity with the Korean People and for Supporting Korea's Reunification in Jordan in a statement issued on August 1 on the occasion of the month of international solidarity with the Korean people.
 The world progressive people are celebrating the day of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War, the statement said, adding the great victory won by the Korean people under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung opened a history of victory of the world people and marked the beginning of the imperialist forces going downhill.    
 The Korean people engaged in a heroic struggle are advancing towards a brighter future while meeting all the challenges of the imperialist allied forces under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il, the statement noted.

articles.title: Japanese reactionaries' Negation of Past History under Fire
articles.content:
Functions for Reunification Held in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Functions for reunification are now taking place in different parts of south Korea on the threshold of the 60th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
 A function for reunification of the northern district of Seoul was opened on the University Street of Seoul on August 6 under the sponsorship of the Northern District, Seoul, Federation of University Student Councils under the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils and the Northern District, Seoul, Society of Youth for Loving the Country. A ceremony of renaming the University Street "Reunification Street" took place at the function.    
 Speakers at the function called upon the youth and students to take the lead in the patriotic movement for reunification, noting that the function is aimed to make this year a year of independent reunification, a year of getting the U.S. forces withdrawn from south Korea and, for the present, conduct brisk information service to significantly hold the August 15 grand national festival for independence, peace and reunification. 
 On August 7, a North Chungchong Provincial reunification function for independence, peace and reunification on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the liberation of Korea was held in Chongju, North Chungchong Province, and a march of people of Taejon city and South Chungchong Province with single desire for peace and reunification, an art performance, the writing of a four line poem for reunification and other functions for reunification were held in Taejon.

Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Abbas 
    Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, chief of the National Authority of Palestine, on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
 It was handed to DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun Thursday by Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Shaher Mohammed Abdlah.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Foreign Diplomats
Letter to Kim Jong Il from Foreigners
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Foreign Diplomats
    Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the Diplomatic Corps here on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
 They were handed to DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun Thursday by Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Shaher Mohammed Abdlah who is doyen of the corps.

Kim Yong Nam Meets Swedish Ambassador
    Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and conversed with outgoing Swedish Ambassador to the DPRK Paul Beijer at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 On hand were Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kung Sok Ung and officials concerned.
